approval_data.project_summary:
1.  **Project Overview**: A modern e-commerce platform to sell various products online.
2.  **Functional Requirements**:
    -   User registration and login.
    -   Product catalog with search and fi...

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description: The platform shall allow new users to register with a unique username, valid email address, and a strong password. The system shall validate the email address via email verification.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description: The platform shall allow registered users to log in using their registered username/email and password. The system shall handle incorrect login attempts.

requirements.title: Product Catalog Display
requirements.description: The platform shall display a product catalog with product details, including name, description, price, images, and availability.

requirements.title: Product Search
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to search for products by keyword, including product name and description.

requirements.title: Product Filtering
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to filter products based on various criteria (e.g., price, category, brand).

requirements.title: Shopping Cart Functionality
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to add products to a shopping cart, view the cart contents, modify quantities, and remove items.

requirements.title: Secure Checkout Process
requirements.description: The platform shall provide a secure checkout process to allow users to complete their purchases, including address and payment information.

requirements.title: Platform Performance
requirements.description: The platform shall be fast and responsive, with pages loading quickly and interactions occurring without noticeable delay.

requirements.title: Platform Security
requirements.description: The platform shall be secure to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access, including data encryption and secure authentication.

2.  **Functional Requirements**:

project_goals: Deliver an intuitive user experience that meets user needs
Ensure optimal system performance and responsiveness
Maintain high security standards and data protection

requirements.title: User Registration
requirements.description: The platform shall allow new users to register with a unique username, valid email address, and a strong password. The system shall validate the email address via email verification.

requirements.title: User Login
requirements.description: The platform shall allow registered users to log in using their registered username/email and password. The system shall handle incorrect login attempts.

requirements.title: Product Catalog Display
requirements.description: The platform shall display a product catalog with product details, including name, description, price, images, and availability.

requirements.title: Product Search
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to search for products by keyword, including product name and description.

requirements.title: Product Filtering
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to filter products based on various criteria (e.g., price, category, brand).

requirements.title: Shopping Cart Functionality
requirements.description: The platform shall allow users to add products to a shopping cart, view the cart contents, modify quantities, and remove items.

requirements.title: Secure Checkout Process
requirements.description: The platform shall provide a secure checkout process to allow users to complete their purchases, including address and payment information.

requirements.title: Platform Performance
requirements.description: The platform shall be fast and responsive, with pages loading quickly and interactions occurring without noticeable delay.

requirements.title: Platform Security

recommendations: Consider adding more detailed acceptance criteria for requirements
